name: govjobssafari
description: GovJobsSafari is a full-stack web application that aggregates and displays government job opportunities. The project includes a web scraping script for collecting data from various government job websites and a MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack for building the interactive frontend and managing the backend.
author: Aafaq Hussain Irfan Sayed, Khan Mohd Kaif Abdul Majid, Khan Misba Soyab, Shaikh Mohd Rafey Rashid
